While eating out, Mike and Joe each tipped their server $ 2$ dollars. Mike tipped $ 10\%$ of his bill and Joe tipped $ 20\%$ of his bill. What was the difference, in dollars between their bills?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 4\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 5\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 10\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 20$
